scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck
scripts.setup: bun i && bun run certs && bun run infra:start && bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate && bun run infra:provision
scripts.infra:start: docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file .env -f deployment/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file .env -f deployment/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.infra:restart: docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file .env -f deployment/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/docker-compose.dev.yml restart
scripts.infra:stop: docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file .env -f deployment/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.infra:logs: docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file .env -f deployment/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f
scripts.infra:status: docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file .env -f deployment/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/docker-compose.dev.yml ps
scripts.build:image: cd deployment && docker compose --env-file ../.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.build.yml build memrok
scripts.test:start: cd deployment && docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file ../.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d memrok
scripts.test:stop: cd deployment && docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file ../.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml stop memrok && docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file ../.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -f memrok
scripts.test:logs: cd deployment && docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file ../.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml logs -f memrok
scripts.test:status: cd deployment && docker compose --project-name memrok --env-file ../.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml ps memrok
scripts.test:image: bun run build:image && bun run test:start
